en.welcome: Welcome to the Crypto Trader Bot!
en.ping_response: Pong! üèì The service is active and running.
en.help_text:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help
/ping - Check bot status

Exchange management:
/add_exchange <name> <exchange> <api_key> <secret_key> - Add new exchange
/remove_exchange <name> - Remove exchange
/list_exchanges - List available exchanges

Trading:
/buy <exchange> <pair> <amount> [price] - Buy asset
/sell <exchange> <pair> <amount> [price] - Sell asset

Account info:
/balance <exchange> - Get balance
/positions [exchange] - Get open positions
